content: without turning at the end of the row 54 20 1 chain double_crochet in same st and in each around slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet finish off and weave in ends copyright designs byzula 2010 www byzula com i have no problem with customers using my patterns to make items and sell them i do however ask that you not pass the patterns off as your own or sell and distribute them thanks so much for being an honest and valued customer - any questions error reports or comments please don t hesitate to contact me all rights reserved
